pages.text: The $(violet)Grand Shulker Box$() is an upgraded shulker box with $(l)double chest capacity$() (54 slots).$(br2)$(#888)Max stack size: 1$()

pages.title: Alchemy Table Recipe
pages.text: $(l)Grand Shulker Box Recipe:$()$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Shulker Box$(br)• 8x Shulker Shell$(br)• Full Resonant Catalyst$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 15 XP, 120 ticks$()

pages.title: Storage Capacity
pages.text: $(l)Storage Features:$()$(br2)• $(violet)54 slots$() (double chest size)$(br)• Preserves inventory when broken$(br)• Animated opening/closing$(br2)$(#888)Unlike normal shulker boxes, this has double the storage capacity.$()

pages.title: Limitations
pages.text: $(l)Limitations:$()$(br2)• Cannot be dyed (single variant)$(br)• Stacks to 1 only$(br2)$(#888)The increased capacity makes up for these limitations.$()
